section_en:
Asterion is written mainly in PHP and built over the LAMP environment. It was conceived to create completely customized multilingual websites in a short period of time.

Asterion concentrates every resource that a website has. The idea is to use only one control for the entire website making it easier to understand when coding.

This framework is designed for web developers that are skilled in PHP, HTML, CSS and MySQL.

You should use Asterion in the following cases :

  1. When you need to have absolute freedom over every single technical aspect of your website. Meaning that you don't want just to configure modules or plugins but create them yourself.
  2. When you need a website that has multiple languages and you don't want to pass trought complicated translation systems.
  3. When you need to evolve your website into a web service or web application using the same data structure.
